User-agent: *
Allow: /

# Sitemap
Sitemap: https://basecorporativa.com.br/sitemap.xml

# Disallow admin pages
Disallow: /admin/
Disallow: /checkout/
Disallow: /orders/

# Allow important pages
Allow: /
Allow: /catalog
Allow: /product/
Allow: /about
Allow: /contact
Allow: /size-guide
Allow: /shipping
Allow: /returns
Allow: /faq
Allow: /privacy

# Crawl delay (optional)
Crawl-delay: 1
